comment.text: This translation key is used for the label that expands to show more information about expanding plugin functionality in the Plugin SDK. It appears as a button in the developer tools section of portal settings, allowing users to learn more about using the SDK effectively.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Expand functionality" is better translated as "توسيع نطاق الوظائف" (tawsee' nitaq al-waza'if) rather than just "توسيع الوظائف" (tawsee' al-waza'if). The former implies expanding the scope or range of functionality, which aligns better with the English original.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بتوسيع نطاق الوظائف باستخدام اضافات SDK

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "اضافات SDK" is understandable, it would be more consistent to use "حزمة تطوير البرمجيات" (huzmat tatweer al-barmajiyyat) for SDK, aligning with more technical terminology.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بتوسيع نطاق الوظائف باستخدام حزمة تطوير البرمجيات

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Plugin SDK' is better translated as 'plugin inkişaf kompleti' or 'plugin developer pack' for better clarity and understanding in Azerbaijani. While 'SDK plaginindən istifadə edərək' is understandable, it's a more literal and less natural rendering.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SDK plaginindən istifadə edərək -> Plugin inkişaf kompleti istifadə edərək

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the translation uses a less common word order. While understandable, Azerbaijani often prioritizes the subject first.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: SDK plaginindən istifadə edərək funksionallığı genişləndirin -> Funksionallığı SDK plaginindən istifadə edərək genişləndirin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Extinderea funcționalității cu ajutorul kit-ului de dezvoltare a plugin-urilor' is a bit wordy and less direct than the English 'Expand functionality using Plugin SDK'. A more concise and accurate translation would be closer to 'Extinderea funcționalității prin SDK-ul de plugin-uri' or 'Extindeți funcționalitatea cu SDK-ul de plugin-uri'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Extindeți funcționalitatea cu SDK-ul de plugin-uri

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Using the acronym 'SDK' is more common in technical Romanian and would maintain consistency with the original English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'SDK' instead of spelling out 'kit-ul de dezvoltare'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'පේනු SDK භාවිතා කර පුළුල් ක්‍රියාකාරීත්‍වයක් අත්විඳින්න' doesn't directly translate to 'Expand functionality using Plugin SDK'. The phrasing is more like 'Experience expanded functionality using Plugin SDK'. While conveying a similar concept, it deviates from the original wording.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පහසුකම් පුළුල් කිරීම සඳහා Plugin SDK භාවිතා කරන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically not incorrect, 'පේනු' might be perceived as an informal way to say 'Plugin'. A more formal and potentially clearer option might be preferred depending on the context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Plugin SDK භාවිතා කර පුළුල් ක්‍රියාකාරීත්‍වයක් අත්විඳින්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "фукционалност" is a misspelling. The correct spelling is "функционалност".

While 'Proširi fukcionalnost' is a reasonable translation of 'Expand functionality', a more natural and precise translation might be 'Poboljšaj funkcionalnost' or 'Dopuni funkcionalnost'. 'Proširi' can imply physically expanding something.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Poboljšaj funkcionalnost koristeći Plugin SDK (SDK za dodatke)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The parenthetical addition '(SDK za dodatke)' is a bit clunky. While the explanation is helpful, it disrupts the flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing it or integrating it more seamlessly, e.g., 'Proširi funkcionalnost koristeći Plugin SDK, poznat i kao SDK za dodatke.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Eklenti SDK'sını kullanarak işlevselliği genişletin' is technically correct but a bit stiff and less natural for Turkish. 'Eklenti SDK'si' implies possession which isn't necessarily the intended meaning. A more natural phrasing would be 'Eklenti SDK ile işlevselliği genişletin' or 'Eklenti SDK'yı kullanarak işlevselliği genişletin'.
